body.description: Avolusion PRO-5X Series 16TB (16-Terabyte) External Hard Drive is the value hard drive upgrade kit provides the best and easy solution to expand your Desktop PC / Laptop storage capacity instantly! Plug and Play USB 3.0 interface providing a perfect portable storage solution for you to store & backup your game data, music, picture, video and more! Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive designed to work with your Windows OS Desktop PC, Laptop perfectly! Fully compatible with any Windows OS devices. It comes with silent fan-less design to keep your External Hard Drive operate quietly! Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive Upgrade Kit features high-quality construction, advanced external interface technology, durable chassis and state-of-the-art industrial design, assured to provide you with years of reliable performance. Features: UPC: 810064872303 Model: PRO5X-WH-16TB-WIN Built-in 16TB Capacity Hard Drive Compatible with Windows 11, 10, 8, 7 Windows NTFS File System Pre-Formatted Expand computer hard drive storage instantly! Add extra storage to your Desktop PC / Laptop Without opening up the case Specification: Interface: USB 3.0 Built-In Capacity : 16TB Material: Plastic/PVC USB Data Speed: 5.0 Gbit/s Support Platform: Windows OS Color: White Dimension: 8"(L) x 5"(W) x 1.6"(H) Power Input: 100V ~ 240V (50-60Hz 0.8A) Power Output: 12V 2.0A Package Contents: Avolusion PRO-5X 16TB External Storage (Windows OS) USB 3.0 Cable Power Adapter User Manual 2 Years Warranty

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 43 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast drive for a dirt cheap price 14.55TiB = 16TB, same cap, different units of measurement
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed with the performance of this drive and it is also quiet for a spinning disk. No problems formatting to full capacity.Reviewers seem confused as to why Windows claims the formatted capacity is 14.5TiB vs the 16TB advertised capacity with some thinking it is formatting overhead and such but it isn't. Manufacturers and some operating systems like macOS use decimal counting where 1000 kilobytes (KB) is 1 megabyte (MB). Windows uses binary counting where 1000 kibibytes (KiB) = 1 Mebibyte (MiB).Simply manufactures and macOS measure in terabytes, Windows uses tebibytes. 16 TB = 14.55 TiB. It is the same capacity, just measured in different units.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I think this drive is a great value. Lots of storage for a good price. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: While I think it's kind of ridiculous that 16 TB hard drives are advertised as such when there is only 14.5 TB of usable space after formatting (although this is more of an industry issue than specific to this product), this drive does seem to work as advertised. The downside, it needs to be plugged in and makes quite a bit of noise when writing. Otherwise, decent storage capacity for the price and fairly fast writing speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These drives are cheap for a reason. Don’t be fooled by the positive comments. The drive is cheap for a reason. Nothing but problems, drive is unrecognizable on windows, fix the partition table with Linux, and repeat. Drive becomes corrupt at every eject and power down cycle. And now I have lost my backup. Do not buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with speed
reviews.reviewText: I'm impressed with the speed of this drive. It's a 7200 RPM drive and it's running relatively cool. It's perfect for recording my surveillance cameras video streams. The price and 2-year warranty are really the frosting on the cake.BTW for those who are not familiar with drive sizes, the operating system typically uses 10% of the drive space for formatting purposes. 16TB x 0.90 = 14.4TB which is your usable drive space. This is true with any drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Read / Write Speeds
reviews.reviewText: I needed some backup storage. I have a number of NAS devices that were filling up and needed to back up some of the data in a cost effective way. Thanks to Amazon's return policy, I felt like I would give this unit a try due to the cost per terabyte and a fairly nice looking form factor based on the pictures.I was pleasantly surprised when getting this together and setup. I did a test comparison with CrystalDisk and this unit was around 40% faster read/write speeds than my Seagate Firecuda Gaming Hub. Both of them are 7200 RPM drives, but was very happy with the performance.My avg read speed was 283.96 and my avg write speed was 280.67.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CAPACIDADE DE AMARZENAMENTO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This review is based on only ONE hard drive that was purchased. So let's be clear this is NOT a representative sample. Normally I'm not going to format a hard drive doing a surface scan of a 16TB hard drive - it takes more than a day. However since my experience with this brand was zilch, it got the surface scan while formatting the drive and it seemed to fail - twice. No biggie. I sent it back and instantly got a refund (or maybe a credit). Hopefully this was an aberration. Do yourself a favor - scan the disk. If this was an not aberration perhaps we'll roll the dice again. Give the company another chance.
Buen producto, herramienta utilizada para almacenar mis archivos dispersos en diferentes medios, ahora tengo todo en un lugar con bastante espacio y de fácil acceso.
Se ve bonito es muy barato, recomiendo

reviews.reviewTitle: Quiza una de las mejores opciones costo x TeraBite a la fecha (06.2023)
reviews.reviewText: Aproveché el precio para adquirir esta unidad durante el HOTSALE 2023.Debo admitir que quede bastante sorprendido con la unidad, tanto en velocidad como en costo por terabite.La unidad se encuentra protegida con un chasis de buena calidad. Transferir la información de 2 discos de 8 TB a esta unidad llevó aproximadamente 3.5 dias.Considero que fue buena compra.
